column1: '''Andraste''' is a character created specifically for [[The Lord of the Rings Online]]. She was the mistress of ''[[crebain]]'' that attacked [[Fredegar Bolger]].<ref>{{VGC
column2: SAI}}, Chapter 7: "Horn-call of Buckland"</ref> She was slain in the [[Barrow-downs]] along with her crebain.<ref>{{VGC
